how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.me: This is the MAYZ Protocol ISPO. Delegate ADA and get $MAYZ rewards with increased APY vs the regular ADA estimated APY
about.server: We are operating using Virtual Machines with a total of 2 Relay Nodes and 1 Bare Metal Block Producer Node, located in Patagonia, Argentina.
